com.vectorprint.report.itext.style.css

Interface CssToBaseStylers

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.w3c.css.sac.DocumentHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CssDocumentHandler

    public interface CssToBaseStylers
extends org.w3c.css.sac.DocumentHandler
    How to get from css to BaseStylers.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fillParameters(BaseStyler bs, Collection<com.vectorprint.configuration.parameters.Parameter> params, String key, org.w3c.css.sac.LexicalUnit value)
      Use multiple parameters for the implementation of a css property, see BaseStyler.findForCssProperty(java.lang.String).
      String fromLexicalUnit(org.w3c.css.sac.LexicalUnit lu)
      Construct a String to use in Parameter.convert(java.lang.String).
      String getClassFromSelector(org.w3c.css.sac.Selector selector)
      Turn a css Selector into a className, return null when the Selector is not supported
      Float getPoints(org.w3c.css.sac.LexicalUnit lu)
      Convert a lexical unit into a float (conversion to points (72 points in one inch)), applicable for LexicalUnit.SAC_MILLIMETER, LexicalUnit.SAC_PIXEL etc.
      Collection<BaseStyler> getStylersFound(org.w3c.css.sac.Selector selector)
      Should yield a collection of BaseStylers found during parsing css for a given Selector.
      com.vectorprint.configuration.EnhancedMap getStyling()
      turn a parsed css stylesheet into settings suitable for a StylerFactory#initSettings(java.util.Map) .
      void printStylers(OutputStream os)
      Print the BaseStylers to a stylesheet for use by a StylerFactory after conversion of a css stylesheet to a collection of BaseStylers.
      Collection<BaseStyler> toBaseStylerParam(org.w3c.css.sac.Selector cssClass, String key, org.w3c.css.sac.LexicalUnit value)
      Each selector in the list of css selectors should map to a set of stylers that are responsible for the implementation of css properties.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.w3c.css.sac.DocumentHandler

        comment, endDocument, endFontFace, endMedia, endPage, endSelector, ignorableAtRule, importStyle, namespaceDeclaration, property, startDocument, startFontFace, startMedia, startPage, startSelector

        Float getPoints(org.w3c.css.sac.LexicalUnit lu)

      • fromLexicalUnit

        String fromLexicalUnit(org.w3c.css.sac.LexicalUnit lu)
        Construct a String to use in Parameter.convert(java.lang.String). Probably the most messy part of the SAC api, becasue of composed css properties, because of functions for example rgb(r,g,b). It is often necessary to debug in order to find the values you need to convert to String that can be used by Parameter.convert(java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        lu -
        Returns:
